entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
